title: KriszHUN49

comments.body: Quote from: KriszHUN49 on April 28, 2023, 06:15:56 AMNo I dont but I need 0.005 to get the rest its a fee or somekind.But Im chekink the transaction id but there is no transacion with that id   What do you need it for?If you need the btc for a "fee" to withdraw your funds from some site it seems you are getting scammed. comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: btcpepa04 on April 29, 2023, 02:17:32 AMNote2: Loan to member Not trusted but i dont have collateralLoan amount: 500 USD in btcLoan Purpose: personalLoan Repay Amount: 25% interest per month will be paid.Loan Repay Date: 1monthsType of Collateral: None address btc : 19fCVjYVuppjhSvZc4fYimLSjTv63SyoYDNote1:Please help me I want start my project miningNote2: Loan to member Not trusted but i dont have collateralYou've been requesting for a loan since 2017 and still haven't received any does that not tell you that it's time to stop and look for something more meaningful to engage in? And I'm sure that even if you continue asking for loans from now till the next three Bitcoin halving you still won't see anyone willing to risk their money by giving you a loan.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: KriszHUN49 on April 28, 2023, 06:38:35 AMBut can you guys recommend a real and global known wallet I could use maybe I start the btc trading or mining.Learn. Read. Watch. Learn more. That's what you need to do.By the time you've done that, you'll know that a "global known wallet" doesn't mean anything. Don't "start trading" when you have no money, it's like gambling and you'll lose. For the mining part: don't even think about it, you're most likely to fall for some cloud mining scam. In short: if you have to ask, you can't mine Bitcoin.Quote from: KriszHUN49 on April 28, 2023, 06:44:38 AMI just realized im a still a.child..That's great, if you want to learn. It's a terrible start to try to create anonymous debts with strangers on the internet.Quote from: Royse777 on April 28, 2023, 11:33:34 PMWithout checking the url behind the tx, I thought you really sent it to OP :-DThat's cute  Without checking the URL, I already knew it must be Rickroll.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: April 30, 2023, 03:01:12 PMLast edit: April 30, 2023, 04:08:45 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Try your local bank or ask a friend or family, its not quite normal behavior to open an account in a forum and ten minutes later ask strangers for a loan.The normal thing to do is to present yourself, show who you are and your intentions, and maybe a couple of months/a year later it could be OK to ask somebody here for a loan when you proved yourself honest.If i was in need of some money i would ask some friend and i would have the money ten minutes later.Its just strange... i don´t understand why totally new accounts go in and straight ask for a loan, they cant for real believe that somebody would send money to a total stranger.But is not the best thing to brainstorm and try to find out something your good at and see if its possible to make any money out of that instead?I am saying this with all respect.But maybe focus on something else instead of trying to get a loan is the first way to go.

comments.author: ChuckBuck
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on April 30, 2023, 03:01:12 PMTry your local bank or ask a friend or family, its not quite normal behavior to open an account in a forum and ten minutes later ask strangers for a loan.The normal thing to do is to present yourself, show who you are and your intentions, and maybe a couple of months/a year later it could be OK to ask somebody here for a loan when you proved yourself honest.If i was in need of some money i would ask some friend and i would have the money ten minutes later.Its just strange... i don´t understand why totally new accounts go in and straight ask for a loan, they cant for real believe that somebody would send money to a total stranger.But is not the best thing to brainstorm and try to find out something your good at and see if its possible to make any money out of that instead?I am saying this with all respect.But maybe focus on something else instead of trying to get a loan is the first way to go.sorry if I digress, but are you spamming? I've seen this content at least 3 times while scrolling through recent posts in this section. Looking at your post history profile, I'm not sure if you're a spammer, but why are you reusing the same content over and over again?Please don't do that again, I don't want to report you
